Text: Every time I try to download the UK version, there's always no sound.  What codecs do I need?
I have VLC and I am experiencing the same sound problem as VelvetKevorkian.  any suggestions?

The codec is ATSC/A-52 Dolby AC3.
You can download the free install app from:

http://ac3filter.sourceforge.net/

It's free and works like a charm.
Once it's installed the files will play the audio nicely. VLC is for dummies. :-P

It is not the UK "version". It's the original. Only Yankee-wankees make lamearse watered versions of popular european... well... anything.
